title: Cognitive Bloom - 25 Min Deep Focus Music | Pravos Focus Sessions
description:
Experience Cognitive Bloom - a 25-minute instrumental journey designed for deep work and focused attention.

I built Pravos (www.pravos.xyz) because I was tired of fragmented focus tools. Spotify for music. A timer app. A to-do list. Multiple tabs, constant context-switching, momentum lost before I even started working.

So I created a simple workspace that combines three things: a Pomodoro timer, a quick task list, and original instrumental focus music - all in one quiet interface.

Each album follows the arc of an ecstatic dance practice: grounding, rising, peak expression, then a soft return. Just enough shape to carry you through a focus session, never enough to distract you.

Try Pravos: www.pravos.xyz
